title: Question about advertising
body: So there is this tourny on teamspeak (Much like the old evenfinder ones) that does a tourny every weekend, they use there own money to fund it and it is legit , C9Biofrost played 1-2weeks ago. So I just want to know is it allowed to advertise this on the boards or not?

replies.body: You probs want to advertise Tourney's in either [Esports](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports) or [Team Recruitment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) here on the boards. Check the guidelines in the left pane of the board before posting though!
